long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is the Holiday Vibes Extension?
Relax and enjoy holiday backgrounds from some of the most amazing places around the world, all from your New Tab.  This extension changes your new tab to tranquil holiday backgrounds for you to enjoy

Installation
1. By clicking on the Add to Chrome button.
2. By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Holiday Vibes extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ new tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Search results will be powered by Bing, You may remove or disable this extension anytime. Photos are from Pexels.
3. Review our Privacy Policy: https://holidayvibesextension.com/policy.html
4. Review our Terms of Service: https://holidayvibesextension.com/terms.html 

Features
* Uninstall anytime easily from the new tab.
* Search from your new tab
* Change backgrounds

Contact 
Contact us at privacy@holidayvibesextension.com or https://holidayvibesextension.com
